    C

    computeRootCanalIndices(char[][][], int[][], int) - Static method in class FloridianToothRecords
    Compute the family's root canal indices: roots of I*x^2 + B*x - M = 0, where I, B, M are totals across all people and layers.

    E

    extractTooth(Scanner, String[], char[][][], int[][], int) - Static method in class FloridianToothRecords
    Extract (remove) a tooth: asks for family member, layer (U/L), tooth number.
